summary: Hey! This is my first follower mod. Hope you like it! (The stripes on Max's face in the image are from the fire. Not from the character.)
descriptionHtml:
Hello again.

First of all, HUGE thanks to [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/86876]Bennzoor[/url]﻿ for letting me use his presets mod to make this follower!

Download the original mod here: https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/86876

or

Click [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/86876]Bennzoor's[/url] name here.

I just learned how to do this, so don't judge me to hard if something goes wrong. I'm just learning.

Well, this mod can be instaled with the NMM. But if you prefer a manual installation, follow these instructions:

-Extract the file.
-Copy (or just Drag and Drop) the files to your Skyrim Data folder.
-Open the Game
-Enjoy!


Max is located in the Plegaria Farm. The house next to the tall building.
author: PoopyButt INC
